info: T means true, F means False. If no publications, just leave the publication structure unchanged.
name: Chuanyi Mark Lu

publications.text: Lu C, Giordano FJ, Bao X, Morris KC, Rothman A. Antisense fosB RNA inhibits thrombin-induced hypertrophy in cultured pulmonary arterial smooth muscle cells. Circulation 1998; 98:596-603.

Lu CM, et al. Mass spectrometric immunoassay for parathyroid hormone-related protein. Anal Chem 2002; 74:5507-12.
Lu CM, et al. Concurrent acute myeloid leukemia with inv(16)(p13.1q22) and chronic lymphocytic leukemia: molecular evidence of two separate diseases. Am J Hematol 2006; 81:963-968.
Lu CM, et al. Simultaneous presence of major chromosomal abnormalities in blasts crisis of chronic myeloid leukemia. Cancer Genet Cytogenet 2007; 172:174-175.
Bao X, Lu CM, et al. Epinephrine is required for normal cardiovascular responses to stress in the phenylethanolamine N-methyltransferase knockout mouse. Circulation. 2007;116(9):1024-31.
Bao X, Lu CM, et al. Impaired chronotropic response to exercise in mice lacking catecholamines in adrenergic cells. Ann N Y Acad Sci. 2008;1148:297-301.
Lu CM. Section VI: Immunophenotyping markers. In Tietz Clinical Guide to Laboratory Tests, fourth edition, Saunders Elsevier 2006.
Nicoll D, McPhee S, Pignone M, Lu CM. Pocket Guide to Diagnostic Tests, fifth edition, McGraw Hill 2008.
